website_summaries.verdict: Heavily back-weighted driver head gives you more power and distance off the tee.
pros: Plenty of forgiveness for mis-hit shots to keep the ball straighter
Delivers a solid sound and feel at impact, giving you feedback on the success of your shot
Adjustable loft of plus or minus 2 degrees to normal setting
cons: Making loft adjustments can be tricky
Not the newest driver design from this manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: This was my husband's Christmas present. While he was thrilled to receive it, we're both a bit frustrated trying to find instruction to adjust the club. The included wrench had a tag saying to look on a TM website for the manual - nothing is there for a 2017 M2 Men's Driver. Yes to M1, M3, M5, but not this club. IF they all adjust the same, say so. Otherwise it's an inexcusable shortcut by TaylorMade.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: New technology = Better Play
customer_reviews.text: I'm 73 & 5'10" - this club is perfect - I can really grip it and rip it - my old driver was 15 yrs. old & this driver is a big improvement. Big Face, very forgiving - fewer muffed drives - easy to hit straight & get 200/250 yards with my slower swing speed.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: We'll see
customer_reviews.text: American Airlines snapped my previous driver, so I bought this as winter was coming on. I haven't been able to get down to the Valley to play. However, it seems to be new, seems to be the real deal, and should be fine. I'm a pro golf teacher, and am particular about my equipment, love Taylormade. I could get discounts directly from various manufacturers, but I find prices to be even better here. It arrived when they said it would and was packaged securely.
customer_reviews.author: iemusic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Novice golfer, this is my 2nd driver, so not much experience. it took about 50 or so hits at the range to "break" it in and get used to it. has a funny crackling sound at first but goes away with use. Hit well right out of the box. slapped a jumbo grip on it , made some tweaks on the loft and its perfecto
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: M2 has me like BAM!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the R15. Looks like the profile has been slimmed down a bit, but wow does the ball fly off the face. I've had to slow my swing down just a bit, because I was flying my typical landing spots.
customer_reviews.author: ralph d arguelles

customer_reviews.title: Nice club/ poor grips
customer_reviews.text: Driver is awesome, added 50+ yards and very easy to hit straight, would give a minus 5 stars on the grips, very poor and cheap grips, after a couple of rounds they get hard and slippery. If you purchase the Taylor Made M2 set you may want to invest in regripping right away. For a $1500 complete set you think they would give you better quality grips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great club
customer_reviews.text: I broke my old Taylormade driver last year...I guess I hit the ball too hard!?! So I was searching for a replacement. I tried many clubs including the M1, M3 and M4...but the M2 felt best for me. I picked up 15 ~ 20 yards over my old driver.
customer_reviews.author: Time Flies

customer_reviews.title: Great feel! Nice sound and balance
customer_reviews.text: Great feel! Nice sound and balance. Haven’t used it enough yet to notice big yardage change but I love it
customer_reviews.author: indianscoach

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase...would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The folks from Carl’s Golf Land were extremely helpful and responsive through the buying process. I received my TaylorMade M2 exactly as ordered in a timely manner. The headcover and TaylorMade wrench were both included as well as a branded set of tees and ball marker from Carl’s Golf Land. Can’t wait to put it in play!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holdorf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I still suck but I don't think its the driver!
customer_reviews.author: Tinman50266

customer_reviews.title: Hit your balls
customer_reviews.text: First drive in my backyard shot a ball right through my vinyl fence the club gave it so much power it when another 50 yards after It went through the fence hits the ball like a rocket to Mars
customer_reviews.author: Adam Blough

customer_reviews.title: Great driver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great driver with a great sound when hitting the ball! Fast delivery and comes with head cover and wrench. I had the older TaylorMade R11S driver that worked wonderful and thought I would step up the their M line and do not regret it! Added 25 yards to my drives and now I’m averaging in the 300-315 on my drives. Grip is good but I do miss my Golf Pride grip I had on my old driver.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Driver To HIT.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds funny when you hit it, but it is the best driver I have owned. I'm happy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Notloc

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for fiance!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this driver. I got it for my fiance for his birthday and it was such a great deal and he absolutely loved how it drove.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: The sound and feel when you make perfect contact is just right. Didn't add distance to my drive but I'm already long off the tee so consistent accuracy is more important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great driver, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic driver, brand new in original factory wrappings. Included head cover and adjustment wrench. Haven't been to the range to try it out, but it's a real beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Boxley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed again!
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a headcover or adjustable wrench, important items when purchasing an adjustable driver. Simple quality controls would help to make sure necessary items are included with golf club sales. Not the first time this has happened. Also, ordered on Friday, 10/26, guaranteed Sunday 10/28 delivery but received on Monday, 10/29.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: Great driver, easy to adjust on the range, fit to improve your game.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great driver for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Brand new as advertised, included club head cover and loft adjustment tool - great package. Driver on impact does not produce a "whacking" sound as expected but delivers great results downrange!
customer_reviews.author: MGinBako

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this club. Very good price and fast delivery. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me (amateur player) .. easy to hit the ball, great distance
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rey Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far my husband likes it. Hasnt had good enough weather to use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Good club
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong club at first, but after a return/refund and re-order I got what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A Schmig

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Is by far the easiest hitting driver I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with feel at impact
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the feel at impact like my older Taylor Made Driver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still have to hit it right.
customer_reviews.text: Still have to hit right. I have both the 2016 and 2017 versions. I don't see much difference in performance. Only the 2016 is $100 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: jackn

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. Says it easily adds 30 yds to his drive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, very quick delivery! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Stout

customer_reviews.title: Great feel great distance
customer_reviews.text: Best driver I ever hit. Would buy it again in a second
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best driver ever
customer_reviews.text: Great club. Looks great when I approach the ball with it. Hit it further that my old driver
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Great Driver
customer_reviews.text: This M2 driver is the bomb. It is very forgiving and I pick up 25 more yard in distance.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs from Tsylormade
customer_reviews.text: Have used Taylormade clubs for ten plus years. M2 is another solid club.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has a very large sweet spot which helps carry the ball further.
customer_reviews.text: Love to play golf and this club has gotten me back the distance that I had lost.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M Duchene

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The club was advertised with a Fujikura shaft but came with a Project X shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dont have to swing hard with this club to get distance
customer_reviews.text: This driver you can feel the weight of the club and for me it is easier to control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product speaks for itself, TaylorMade quality is a natural byproduct.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbeliveable how easy it is to hit. Igained at least 15 yards. Awsom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and honest
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional price and fast delivery of exact the product as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great club - annoyingly loud though
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had more of a traditional sound - gave me a headache the first time I used it. Doesn't impact performance though, which is great - really forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Max L.

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new but didn’t come with wrench
customer_reviews.text: This club is sold as brand new but did not come with the wrench to make club head adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C.

customer_reviews.title: If your swing has problems this club won't fix it ...but it'll help.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: A pictures worth a 1000 words.... see photo. Buy this club you won't regret it. Added 20 yards from the get go. I wasn't paid for this ........ Cons: but I should be, it's an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great driver. Added 30+ yards to my drive and they are straighter!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is a awesome clue very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Spezzano

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: No better than any club I own. A good swing provides a good result with old or new club. Not worth the money. Spend your money on lessons...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My game is still terrible, but hey I've got the newest driver currently out!
customer_reviews.author: acowlaughing

product_meta.title: TaylorMade 2017 M2 Men's Driver 460cc
product_meta.description: TaylorMade Men's 2017 M2 DriverOverview * Maybe the biggest surprise of the 2016 golf season was the sheer dominance of TaylorMadeaTMs M2 driver. When it was first released, many viewed the M2 as nothing more than the M1aTMs little brother. But as the year progressed it became the most popular driver in golf among touring pros and amateurs alike. * That left TaylorMade with a significant challenge in making the updated M2 driver even better, but itaTMs a challenge that has been accomplished, albeit in multiple ways. * With the M2 driver comes the introduction of Geocoustic Technology, as TaylorMade combined innovative shaping to increase the overall MOI with improved acoustic engineering that creates better sound and feel at impact. * By using more carbon in the design, 25 grams of weight was freed up to create a larger overall footprint for more forgiveness and a CG placement thataTMs even lower and deeper than it was in the original M2, which creates high launch, low spin, and enhanced stability at impact. * The Speed Pocket on the updated M2 has also been redesigned and is now three times more flexible than its predecessor, which is creating faster ball speeds. * The updated M2 features a 460cc clubhead and a lightweight aluminum loft sleeve that allows players to adjust loft by +/- 2 degrees to achieve their preferred ball flight. * Includes headcover Speed PocketRedesigned for the new M2, the Speed Pocket is now three times more flexible than it was in the original M2, which creates faster ball speeds across the face.Carbon Composite ConstructionThe use of more carbon in the clubhead created discretionary weight that was used to create a lower, deeper CG placement.Geocoustic TechnologyOptimal sound and feel are created by combining unique geometric shaping and improved acoustic management in the overall design.Lightweight, Aluminum Loft SleeveAllows players to adjust loft (+/-2 degrees) and lie angle to create their ideal trajectory and ball flight.TaylorMade
feature_bullets: All-new multi-material construction saves weight & repositions CG low and back; 6-layer carbon crown with 911 skeletal Titanium body frees up weight and heavy back weight
Geocoustic technology is advanced sole shaping with recessed toe panel that enables club face expansion for added forgiveness and externalized sound ribs
Deeper, more active speed pocket with 3x more active than original M2 to increase flexion and forgiveness across the clubface and generates high launch/low spin shots to achieve massive distance
Ff2ff precision process with crown-to-body craftsmanship of the highest quality and manufacturing repeatability for consistent look and performance
Premium features and options include Fujikura XLR8 Pro Stock shaft with 30+ additional no-upcharge shafts, dual feel grip, and ultra-lightweight, aluminum, 4 degree loft sleeve with 12 settings
